_header: That I wretch that sinful was
_description: The vow of the penitent and the confessor’s reply — three couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Þat I wrecche þat senfujl wasMouwe fynde merci & cum to
                    grasAfter þis day nou wil I blinnefforwarde maken with dedli
                        senneResponsio confessoris Hold forwarde & be
                    stedefast& þin is þe blisse þat euere sal
                    lest
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 11.
